Customer Service Unavailable on Friday, May 9th
As previously communicated in our May 1st eNews, we'd like to remind you that on Friday, May 9th, Milwaukee Customer Service will be closed and unavailable for inquiries and orders due to necessary system upgrades. Please plan accordingly. We apologize in advance for any inconvenience.
Did you miss the Flow Instrumentation webinar? Watch it on the extranet! If you missed the webinar on April 25th, be sure to watch the recording available on the extranet. Judson Luke, marketing services manager, conducted a quick-hitting, sales-focused explanation for the Flow Instrumentation re-branding.
